revised_title: Intravascular Coagulation in Albinoes and Pigmented Animals: The Behavior of Nucleo-proteids of Testes in Solution
tldr: The author investigates the relationship between albinism and pigmentation in intravascular coagulation. They find that two sub-races of albinoes exist, one clotting upon intravascular injection of nucleo-proteids and the other not. The study also examines the behavior of nucleo-proteids from testes in solution and their effect on coagulation.
